titleStmt.title: By the Kyng and the Quene where as by the statute made in the seconde yeare of Kynge Henry the Fourth, concernyng the repression of heresies ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1553-1558 : Mary I)
Mary I, Queen of England, 1516-1558.

publicationStmt.publisher: In ædibus Iohannis Cawodi typographi Regiæ Maiestatis,

notesStmt.note: Other title information from first 2 lines of text.
For suppressing reforming religious books, and the Book of Common Prayer.
"Geuen under our Signes Manuell, at our honour of Hampton courte, the xiii. day of June, the first & second yeares of our reygnes."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
